tool_description:
Check baseball live scores on BaseballAPi every game in real time. BaseballApi covers all major leagues and offers information and odds for each. Follow most popular leagues such as MLB, LMB, Pro Yakyu - NPB and others.
For increased rates and more sports, please look at: https://rapidapi.com/fluis.lacasse/api/allsportsapi2/
name: BaseballApi
title: BaseballApi

api_list.name: MatchPlayerStatistics
api_list.description: Get the statistics for a specific baseball player in the match by providing its ID.

required_parameters.name: playerId
required_parameters.description: The player id.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The ID of the baseball match for which you want to get the player statistics.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://baseballapi.p.rapidapi.com/api/baseball/match/9864379/player/977489/statistics"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "baseballapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://baseballapi.p.rapidapi.com/api/baseball/match/{id}/player/{playerid}/statistics"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "baseballapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Search
api_list.description: Search for baseball-related entities using the provided search term, and filter the results to show only baseball-related entities.

required_parameters.name: term
required_parameters.description: The search term to use for finding baseball-related entities.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://baseballapi.p.rapidapi.com/api/baseball/search/mlb"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "baseballapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://baseballapi.p.rapidapi.com/api/baseball/search/{term}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "baseballapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: MatchSchedules
api_list.description: This operation returns the baseball match schedules for the given date, including match timings, teams, and other relevant information.

required_parameters.name: month
required_parameters.description: The month for which you want to retrieve the match schedules (1-12).

required_parameters.name: year
required_parameters.description: The year for which you want to retrieve the match schedules (e.g., 2022).

required_parameters.name: day
